verses.verse: And I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and, see, <S%G2400><s%> a Lamb <S%G721><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> Sion, <S%G4622><s%> and with him an hundred <S%G1540><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> his Father's <S%G3962><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> as the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%> and as the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> thunder: <S%G1027><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of harpers <S%G2790><s%> harping <S%G2789><s%> with their harps: <S%G2788><s%>

And they sung <S%G103><s%> as it were a new <S%G2537><s%> song <S%G5603><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts, <S%G2226><s%> and the elders: <S%G4245><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> that song <S%G5603><s%> but the hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were redeemed <S%G59><s%> from the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are they which <S%G3739><s%> were not defiled <S%G3435><s%> with women; <S%G1135><s%> for they are virgins. <S%G3933><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> are they which <S%G3588><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> he goes. <S%G5217><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> were redeemed <S%G59><s%> from among men, <S%G444><s%> being the first fruits <S%G536><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and to the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

And in their mouth <S%G4750><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> guile: <S%G1388><s%> for they are without <S%G299><s%> fault <S%G299><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> fly <S%G4072><s%> in the middle <S%G3321><s%> of heaven, <S%G3321><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the everlasting <S%G166><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> to them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and to every <S%G3956><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kindred, <S%G5443><s%> and tongue, <S%G1100><s%> and people, <S%G2992><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to him; for the hour <S%G5610><s%> of his judgment <S%G2920><s%> is come: <S%G2064><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> him that made <S%G4160><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and earth, <S%G1093><s%> and the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and the fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And there followed <S%G190><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> is fallen, <S%G4098><s%> is fallen, <S%G4098><s%> that great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> she made <S%G4222><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> drink <S%G4222><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of her fornication. <S%G4202><s%>

And the third <S%G5154><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> them, saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man worship <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and his image, <S%G1504><s%> and receive <S%G2983><s%> his mark <S%G5480><s%> in his forehead, <S%G3359><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in his hand, <S%G5495><s%>

The same <S%G846><s%> shall drink <S%G4095><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is poured <S%G2767><s%> out without <S%G194><s%> mixture <S%G194><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of his indignation; <S%G3709><s%> and he shall be tormented <S%G928><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone <S%G2303><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> and in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the Lamb: <S%G721><s%>

And the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of their torment <S%G929><s%> ascends <S%G305><s%> up for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever: <S%G165><s%> and they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and his image, <S%G1504><s%> and whoever <S%G1536><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of his name. <S%G3686><s%>

Here <S%G5602><s%> is the patience <S%G5281><s%> of the saints: <S%G40><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> are they that keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, Write, <S%G1125><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the dead <S%G3498><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> die <S%G599><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> from now on: <S%G534><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> that they may rest <S%G373><s%> from their labors; <S%G2873><s%> and their works <S%G2041><s%> do follow <S%G190><s%> them.

And I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and behold <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and on the cloud <S%G3507><s%> one sat <S%G2521><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> crown, <S%G4735><s%> and in his hand <S%G5495><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle. <S%G1407><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> Thrust <S%G3992><s%> in your sickle, <S%G1407><s%> and reap: <S%G2325><s%> for the time <S%G5610><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> for you to reap; <S%G2325><s%> for the harvest <S%G2326><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is ripe. <S%G3583><s%>

And he that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%> thrust <S%G906><s%> in his sickle <S%G1407><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> was reaped. <S%G2325><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple <S%G3485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle. <S%G1407><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from the altar, <S%G2379><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> fire; <S%G4442><s%> and cried <S%G5455><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> cry <S%G2906><s%> to him that had <S%G2192><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thrust <S%G3992><s%> in your sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> and gather <S%G5166><s%> the clusters <S%G1009><s%> of the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth; <S%G1093><s%> for her grapes <S%G4718><s%> are fully ripe. <S%G187><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> thrust <S%G906><s%> in his sickle <S%G1407><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and gathered <S%G5166><s%> the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> wine press <S%G3025><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the wine press <S%G3025><s%> was trodden <S%G3961><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and blood <S%G129><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the wine press, <S%G3025><s%> even to the horse <S%G2462><s%> bridles, <S%G5469><s%> by the space <S%G575><s%> of a thousand <S%G5507><s%> and six <S%G1812><s%> hundred <S%G5516><s%> furlongs. <S%G4712><s%>
